categories.body: The Legend of Korra episode transcripts

paragraphs.body: This page requires editing to meet Avatar Wiki's quality standards.
paragraphs.text: This page requires editing to meet Avatar Wiki's quality standards.

paragraphs.body: Cut to two Air Acolytes standing in the gallery.
paragraphs.text: Cut to two Air Acolytes standing in the gallery.

paragraphs.body: Cut to the filming set of The Adventures of Nuktuk: Hero of the South. Close-up of Bolin's face, screaming. The camera rotates to reveal him, dressed as Nuktuk, suspended upside-down by props resembling eagle talons.
paragraphs.text: Cut to the filming set of The Adventures of Nuktuk: Hero of the South. Close-up of Bolin's face, screaming. The camera rotates to reveal him, dressed as Nuktuk, suspended upside-down by props resembling eagle talons.

paragraphs.body: Cut to Varrick's office which is glowing orange. The door opens and the two bodyguards shove Mako in. The camera zooms out to show Varrick and the floor which is covered with burning coal.
paragraphs.text: Cut to Varrick's office which is glowing orange. The door opens and the two bodyguards shove Mako in. The camera zooms out to show Varrick and the floor which is covered with burning coal.

paragraphs.body: Cut back to the Eastern Air Temple, where Korra, Tenzin, Kya, Bumi and Jinora are riding atop Oogi while following the dragonfly bunny spirits.
paragraphs.text: Cut back to the Eastern Air Temple, where Korra, Tenzin, Kya, Bumi and Jinora are riding atop Oogi while following the dragonfly bunny spirits.
